name: Alerts Service
description: A Grape/Ruby on Rails microservice that powers the alerts functionality in Salsify, allowing users to subscribe to adds, updates, or deletes of a filtered set of products or digital assets. Alert notifications are sent via webhooks or emails. Uses Kafka for event-driven communication with other services and maintains synchronized subscriptions with the Item Repository (Dandelion). Uses continuous deployment (CD) where commits on master are automatically deployed to production.

name: Alert Subscription
description: A subscription created in the Item Repository (Dandelion) that corresponds to an alert in the Alerts Service. Uses the same triggering configuration as the alert and publishes product/digital asset change events to the alert_subscription_events Kafka topic. Leverages Elasticsearch percolate queries to match product changes against subscription filters.

name: Webhook Alert Notification
description: An alert notification delivery mechanism in the Alerts Service that sends HTTP webhook requests when subscribed events occur. Webhook requests are published to Kafka and dispatched by the Webhook Service with appropriate failure handling and retries.

name: Email Alert Notification
description: An alert notification delivery mechanism in the Alerts Service that sends email notifications when subscribed events occur. Unlike webhooks, email notifications are batched during a cooling period to decrease notification frequency at the cost of increased latency. Processed by the EmailNotificationsDeliverableEventsImporter and sent via the Email Service.

name: Email Notification Cooling Period
description: A time window in the Alerts Service during which email notifications for a given alert are batched together before delivery. This mechanism decreases the frequency of email notifications but increases their latency, preventing users from being overwhelmed with individual emails for each product change.

name: Entity Event Batch Handler
description: A component in the Alerts Service (Alerts::Runtime::EntityEventBatchHandler) responsible for handling batches of product or digital asset change events generated by an alert's subscription. Processes events and routes them to either webhook or email notification handlers based on the alert configuration.

name: Webhook Service
description: A Salsify microservice that listens to Kafka for webhook requests and dispatches them to configured endpoints with appropriate failure handling and retries. Used by the Alerts Service to send webhook alert notifications.

name: Email Service
description: A Salsify microservice responsible for asynchronously sending emails. Used by the Alerts Service to deliver email alert notifications.

name: Salsify Kafka Library
description: A shared Salsify Ruby library that provides Kafka integration capabilities including an Actor Framework for processing Kafka messages. Used by the Alerts Service and other microservices for event-driven communication.

name: Salsify Kafka Actor Framework
description: A framework provided by the salsify_kafka library for processing Kafka events using the actor model. Used by the Alerts Service to handle subscription events and send notifications. Enables concurrent message processing with proper isolation.

name: Item Repository (Dandelion)
description: The core Salsify service (Dandelion) that stores and manages product and digital asset data. Maintains alert subscriptions that use Elasticsearch percolate queries to match products/assets against subscription filters. Publishes change events to the alert_subscription_events Kafka topic.

name: User Repository (Dandelion)
description: A service within Dandelion that manages user data. The Alerts Service queries it to retrieve user information (email, enabled status) and receives events when users are destroyed.

name: Organization Repository (Dandelion)
description: A service within Dandelion that manages organization data. The Alerts Service queries it for organization information to include in webhook payloads and receives events when organizations are destroyed or clear their data.

name: Salsify Development Services
description: A command-line tool for managing local development services at Salsify. Used to start shared infrastructure services like postgres, kafka, avro-schema-registry, and redis required by microservices such as the Alerts Service.
